author: Staff Reporter
text:
Anna Square police have arrested four minors on charges of robbing a man of a smart phone and gold jewels at the Marina Beach during Kaanum Pongal revelry.

Anna Square police said Pradeep of Royapuram was at the beach when the four youth surrounded him, stole his smart phone and jewels weighing two sovereigns.

Police alerted the control rooms at the beach and personnel soon arrested them. The minors have been sent to a juvenile home. – Staff Reporter
title: Minors arrested
